segments.text: Hi . I just lost my purse when I was shopping on the street . I guess somebody stole it from me .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sorry to hear that . Could you tell me what were in your purse ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: My mobile phone , passport and some cash .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: When did you come to America ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Just a couple of days ago .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Could you recall when and where you lost it ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK . I have written it down . Who is your emergency contact person in America ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That is my friend Tim who lives nearby .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK . We will contact you as soon as we have any clues .
segments.speaker: S2
